name: JETPAC (itch)
description:
Avoid the meteors and aliens, collect the precious stones!

See how long you can last, comment below with your score if you have a good run.

Changes v.1.3:

  • Particles
  • High score saving

changes v1.2:

  • More graphical changes

changes v1.1.1:

  • switched to actual version numbers
  • Start menu enhancement
  • Minor in-game graphical changes.

changes 02.13.17:

  • added shooting downwards
  • changed meteor and alien rate
  • aliens sprite color indicates health
  • game gets more difficult over time
  • you can only gain points from aliens by collecting their bones
  • starting health is now 10
